name: vocaloid-rankings-twitter-bot
description: Vocaloid songs ranking twitter bot, hourly updated tweets.

scripts.start: npx tsc && forever stopall && forever start -a -l ~/Documents/vocaloid-rankings-twitter-bot/logs/console.log -o ~/Documents/vocaloid-rankings-twitter-bot/logs/stdout.log -e ~/Documents/vocaloid-rankings-twitter-bot/logs/stderr.log ~/Documents/vocaloid-rankings-twitter-bot/dist/app.js

author: ilPikachu
